data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/rrtjyzKnngEp2akiCM0RtUExPV4.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":27,"name":"Horror"},{"id":9648,"name":"Mystery"},{"id":53,"name":"Thriller"}],"homepage":"","id":394830,"imdb_id":"tt4181782","origin_country":["GB","US"],"original_language":"en","original_title":"The Crucifixion","overview":"When a priest is jailed for the murder of a nun on whom he was performing an exorcism, an investigative journalist strives to determine whether he in fact murdered a mentally ill person, or if he lost the battle with a demonic presence.","popularity":19.619,"poster_path":"/yxTFHGcS0AJab3olU9BjABf5Ogx.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":85466,"logo_path":"/yIDg47SluPIkhh6ZXhJerIMNmRw.png","name":"Motion Picture Capital","origin_country":"GB"},{"id":3870,"logo_path":"/hZlf4rlzB913VrRzSED4NLPy0EM.png","name":"Premiere Picture","origin_country":"GB"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"RO","name":"Romania"},{"iso_3166_1":"GB","name":"United Kingdom"},{"iso_3166_1":"US","name":"United States of America"}],"release_date":"2017-04-27","revenue":6554322,"runtime":90,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"Be careful what you pray for","title":"The Crucifixion","video":false,"vote_average":5.665,"vote_count":471}
